item.title: Ithaca Hours- Local Currency
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jy2nCHX36tI **Uploaded on Aug 15, 2010 **Grassroots Activist Guild ithacahours.org Ithaca Hours is a local currency system that promotes local economic strength and community self-reliance in ways which will support economic and social justice, ecology, community participation and human aspirations in and around Ithaca, New York.
